com.sucy.skill.listener

Class CastCombatListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sucy.skill.listener.SkillAPIListener
      • com.sucy.skill.listener.CastCombatListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class CastCombatListener
extends SkillAPIListener
    Handles interactions with skill bars. This shouldn't be use by other plugins as it is handled by the API.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      CastCombatListener()
